text:
Salt Lake City and San Diego: PHP/Python(/Ruby) software developers. Work with a fantastic team of motivated developers, great benefits, fun environment.

Check out the position: http://www.drivecurrent.com/careers.html

We have a couple long-term applications that are developer in PHP w/ Zend Framework, a smaller application in Ruby, and are planning new development in Python/Django.

Come join us as we grow a new office in Salt Lake City and expand our existing one in San Diego.

Solid paid vacation/holidays, work-at-home days, semi-flexible hours, on-site.
